name: Otávio Burato de Oliveira
about.info: Developer at F1RST focused on technical excellence and continuous business evolution.
summary: Developer analyst with experience in the financial sector, using Java and AWS in systems architecture and development. Work on complex demands, prioritizing commitment, collaboration and creativity, seeking to positively impact the culture and results in all the projects work on.

work.title: Software engineer
work.description: Software Engineer at Banco Santander, one of the largest in Brazil, works with the development and maintenance of APIs and microservices using cutting-edge technologies, such as Java 17, Quarkus, SQL, Kafka, Api Gateway and ACL. His work is centered on building a credit platform, strictly adhering to the best practices of the Well Architected Framework and SOLID. Its approach stands out for its focus on high availability, cohesion and low coupling and customer satisfaction.

work.title: Software developer
work.description: Improvement, support and construction of APIs and microservices, using Java 11, Spring Boot Framework and Apache Camel to integrate systems. Outstanding performance in the post-sales loan system, actively contributing to the design of solutions and the progression of legacy systems.

education.description: Software engineering student in a learning system based on peer-to-peer learning, seeking to develop technical excellence, commitment and respect in interpersonal relationships as professional characteristics.

With a background in systems analysis and development, acquired skills in handling databases, preparing documentation, understanding imperative and functional logic, and analyzing functional and non-functional requirements.

Graduated from high school integrated with a technical course in electronics, studies in Boolean logic were covered through logic gates and electropneumatic circuits, as well as experience in development in Arduino and PLC, using C++ and Ladder languages.
